title: SI dies in accident in Ratnapura
body_lines: A Sub Inspector (SI) if police attached to the Pelmadulla Police Station died following an accident at Pelwadiya, Ratnapura on the Ratnapura-Pelmadulla Road yesterday.
Police said the three wheeler in which the SI was travelling turned turtle as it lost control and slammed head on with lorry coming from the opposite direction.
The SI who was the driving the three-wheeler, was seriously injured in the accident and died on admission to the Ratnapura Hospital.
The lorry driver has been arrested and the Ratnapura Police are conducting further investigations. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
